column2: Better arms and armor for Levy infantry and Archers
This character has proven themselves to be a skilled leader, and can turn a mob into a reasonably effective fighting force.
This character is well adversed with leading well-trained armored infantry into battle, but is at loss when faced with leading rabble.
This character excels at leading men to war on horseback.
column3: Ce personnage excelle dans le commandement de son bataillon de cavalerie.
column4: Dieser Charakter zeichnet sich darin aus, Männer auf dem Pferderücken in den Krieg zu führen.
column6: Este personaje es un experto dirigente en batallas a caballo.
